review: There are a number of feelings I have towards this little stick. I love it ultimately there are only a few small tweeks I would make. The remote is too small and gets lost all the time with a dog and a kid I can never seem to find it. Additionally it won't work if it's not plugged into the wall. I wish it could be charged and then plugged in. But hey, not everything is perfect. I recently had an issue with this where I was in the middle of a show and it shut down. I couldn't get it to work. I contacted customer support. They couldn't make it work either and told me to wait a few hours. That didn't work. I then e-mailed them and they are sending me a replacement no questions asked. That makes me very happy.Pros:Lots of appsYou can chose your apps, they aren't pre-loadedSmallEasy to installPrice cannot be beatCons:Small remote gets lost a lotNeeds to be plugged in all the time, not convenient.
